description.en: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.ar: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.br: Recompensa exclusiva para o jogador da classe que atingiu o nível máximo mais rápido!
description.cns: 为每个职业最快达到满级的玩家特别定制的披风！
description.de: Einzigartige Belohnung für den schnellsten Spieler der Klasse, der die Höchststufe erreicht hat!
description.fi: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.fil: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.fr: Une récompense unique pour le premier joueur de chaque classe à avoir atteint le niveau maximum !
description.id: Unique reward untuk player tercepat pada tiap class yang telah berhasil mencapai level maksimum!
description.it: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.jp: 最大レベルに達したクラスの最速のプレーヤーのためのユニークな報酬！
description.kr: 클래스별로 가장 빠르게 최고 레벨에 도달한 플레이어에게 주어지는 특별한 보상
description.nl: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.pl: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.ru: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.sp: ¡Recompensa única para el jugador más rápido de la clase que alcanzó el nivel máximo!
description.sw: Unique reward for the fastest player of the class who reached the maximum level!
description.th: รางวัลเฉพาะสำหรับผู้เล่นที่เร็วที่สุดในคลาสที่ถึงระดับสูงสุด!
description.tw: 達到最高等級最快玩家的特別獎勵！
description.vi: Phần thưởng duy nhất cho người chơi nhanh nhất trong lớp đạt cấp độ tối đa!
